title: SIEGE OF HELMS DEEP - Third Age Total War
description:
Welcome to the Battle of Hornburg.  This is a custom scenario battle made by Paladin bob.  it consists of 7 players.  And it is very awesome to play!

If you want the proper folders  to play this battle send me am email with this information.  

Email Subject: Battle of Hornburg
Email Message: At Dawn, Look East

- you should get an automatic response with the folders that you need.

My Steam Group:  http://steamcommunity.com/groups/apollosknights

Battle Replay: http://www.mediafire.com/download/cikh74ugs8vmkea/Hornburg.rpy

Rules: The reninforcment (Ents, Cav) can only show up after 15 mins. (Someone must watch the clock.)   The Isengard players can not choke off the entrance of the reinforcements.  GL

Player in this battle:

Pixelated Apollo - Rohan Defenders

Jackie Fish - Silvan Elves https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh

 Ents - Vet_Plague

Rohan Riders - JKBYx10

Isengard - paladinbob https://www.youtube.com/user/Watcherofthelich

Isengard - Emperor Alan

Isengard - Rampaned https://www.youtube.com/user/Rampaned


Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelatedapollo
How to send me battle replays: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nG3uZoDkCU
How to play Medieval 2 Online: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGfItCMitPg
